descriptionHtml:
The NBC 6 South Florida news and weather app connects you with the best local stories, weather forecasts, breaking news, live TV and investigative journalism out of Miami, Hialeah, Ft. Lauderdale and South Florida.

The app gives you access to a free, 24/7 streaming NBC South Florida News channel. The NBC 6 South Florida First Alert Weather team delivers accurate local forecasts that keep app users safe and informed while on the go. Access a powerful weather radar and customize the weather screen based on your preferences.

The NBC 6 South Florida local app helps you stay informed with the following features:

NBC 6 SOUTH FLORIDA FIRST ALERT WEATHER
+ Customizable weather home screen with weather modules you can rearrange
+ Upgraded location hub to add new locations and set up weather alerts
+ Exclusive First Alert Doppler 6000 Radar
+ NBC 6 forecasts for your region of South Florida
+ Hourly forecasts featuring a customizable forecast graph
+ Detailed forecast data that includes UV index, air quality and other weather conditions
+ Weather alerts for every location you save in the app
+ Complete school weather closings
+ Hurricane warnings and storm tracker
+ Weather news videos from your local meteorologists

LOCAL MIAMI AND SOUTH FLORIDA NEWS ALERTS & VIDEOS
+ Alerts for Miami, Hialeah, Ft. Lauderdale and South Florida local news, national headlines and world news that can be personalized and managed in the app settings
+Top news of the day, covering breaking news, politics, weather and urgent product recalls
+ Latest news feed that shows all articles and videos published in reverse chronological order
+ Alerts center that shows you the most urgent South Florida stories of the day that you might’ve missed if you didn’t click on push notifications
+Trending section where you can discover daily, buzz-worthy topics in news and pop culture

NBC SOUTH FLORIDA NEWS 24/7 STREAMING CHANNEL
+ Free 24/7 streaming channel for nonstop local South Florida news, weather and special coverage around the clock, wherever you are
+ Live NBC 6 South Florida newscasts
+ Breaking news live coverage of news briefings and other urgent news events in Miami, Hialeah, Ft. Lauderdale and South Florida
+ Dedicated video page with the latest video feed

NBC 6 SOUTH FLORIDA I-TEAM INVESTIGATIONS & MORE
+ Award-winning NBC 6 Investigators stories that get results
+ NBC 6 Responds reports that research your complaints and work to recover your money
+ Sports news from NBC Sports Regional Sports Networks
+ Business news, finance news and stock market news from CNBC
+ Entertainment and celebrity news from E! Online and Access
+ Lifestyle and entertainment news from NBC TODAY show

NBC6 and Telemundo 51 broadcast from Peacock Plaza, located near 1-75 and Miramar Parkway in Miramar and are owned by NBCUniversal as part of the NBCUniversal Local Owned Stations. WTVJ/NBC6 is Florida’s first television station and the 16th television station in the United States, signing on for the first time on March 21, 1949.

The NBC 6 South Florida news and weather app features Nielsen’s proprietary measurement software which will allow you to contribute to market research, like Nielsen’s TV Ratings. Please see www.nielsen.com/digitalprivacy for more information.
